Q1：special pattern depends on x


```{r pattern}
cat("pls enter the num:",'\n')
x = scan(n=1,what=double(),quiet = TRUE)

string = function(a,b){ #a,b 定義起點和終點
  for (i in a:b){
    if (i == 1){
      line = '*-*'
    }else if (i %%2 == 0){
      line = paste0('-',line,'-')
    }else if (i %%2 == 1 ){
      line = paste0('*',line,'*')
    }
  }
  return(line)
}

pattern = function(x) {
  a = x %/% 2  # 商數
  b = x %% 2  # 餘數
  line = c() 
  
  for (i in 1:a) {  
    line = c(string(1, i), line)  
  }
  
  if (b ==1 ){
    line =c(line,"|")
  }
  
  if (length(line) >= 2){
    for (i in 2:length(line)){
      a = nchar(line)
      space = (max(a)-a[i])%/%2
      a = strrep(" ",space-1)
      line[[i]] = paste(a,line[[i]],a)
    }
  }
  
  
  
  cat(line, sep="\n")
  if (b ==1 ){
    line = head(line, -1)
  }
  cat(rev(line), sep="\n")

}

if (x == as.integer(x)) {
  if (x==0){
    print("")
  }else if (x <0 ){
    print("pls enter non-negative interger")
  }else if (x ==1){
    print('|')
  }else{
    pattern(x)
  }
}else{
  print('pls enter non-negative  interger')
}
```

Q2:Fibonacci sequence
題目未規定明確需要設計的型態，因此以設計到第十個數為主

```{r series, echo=FALSE}
fibonacci = function(a,b){
  c = a+b
  return(c)
}

a= 0
b =1
x = c(0,1)
for (i in 1:10){
  c = fibonacci(a,b)
  x = c(x,c)
  a=b
  b=c
}
print(x)
```
